entry.source: On the {F804,5}top floor{F804,0} of the old department store{F801}{F804,5}in front of Ikebukuro Station,{F804,0} there are{F801}people who can do demon fusions incredibly{F801}fast. At first I thought they were working{F801}with Hunters, but something seems a bit odd.{F801}I want you to go investigate them.{F801}
